reviews.review_msg: He is really a good professor, but his exams are not easy. You don't need to attend his class every time cause he posted videos on canvas. Try to organize his notes and ask him when you get confused, you can get good marks.

I took LING 100 and LING 110 with Yourie and he is by far the best ling prof i have had. In both classes a bit of studying is needed, but he is easy to see during office hours and always spends 2 hours before midterms and exams reviewing with the class.
